content: a neater look finishing weave the ends and wet block to measurements 3 abbreviations co cast on rs right side ws wrong side lc left cable k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches on left needle together 1 stitch decreased k1tbl knit one stitch from the back loop p1tbl purl one stitch from the back loop m1l make one left with the left hand needle lift loop between stitches from front and knit through the back loop increase st s stitch es repeat repeat bobble bind off thank you for knitting with us if you have queries regarding the pattern please get in touch via ravelry or email it s the quickest way for us to get back to you email basmayassinknitwear@gmail com ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/basmayassin instagram https //www instagram com/basma yassin knitwear/ it s great to share your finished garments with fellow knitters not to mention it s a huge source of motivation and makes us happy #basma_yassin_knitwear #na_bi_scarf 4 scarf chart read from bottom to up right to left for odds row left to right for evens row 5
